verses.verse: Behold my servant <WH5650>, whom I uphold <WH8551> <WH8799>; mine elect <WH972>, in whom my soul <WH5315> delighteth <WH7521> <WH8804>; I have put <WH5414> <WH8804> my spirit <WH7307> upon him: he shall bring forth <WH3318> <WH8686> judgment <WH4941> to the goyim <WH1471>.
He shall not cry <WH6817> <WH8799>, nor lift up <WH5375> <WH8799>, nor cause his voice <WH6963> to be heard <WH8085> <WH8686> in the street <WH2351>.

A bruised <WH7533> <WH8803> reed <WH7070> shall he not break <WH7665> <WH8799>, and the smoking <WH3544> flax <WH6594> shall he not quench <WH3518> <WH8762>: he shall bring forth <WH3318> <WH8686> judgment <WH4941> unto truth <WH571>.

He shall not fail <WH3543> <WH8799> nor be discouraged <WH7533> <WH8799>, till he have set <WH7760> <WH8799> judgment <WH4941> in the earth <WH776>: and the isles <WH339> shall wait <WH3176> <WH8762> for his Torah <WH8451>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> 'Elohim <WH410> the YY <WH3068>, he that created <WH1254> <WH8802> the heavens <WH8064>, and stretched them out <WH5186> <WH8802>; he that spread forth <WH7554> <WH8802> the earth <WH776>, and that which cometh out <WH6631> of it; he that giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> breath <WH5397> unto the people <WH5971> upon it, and spirit <WH7307> to them that walk <WH1980> <WH8802> therein:

I the YY <WH3068> have called <WH7121> <WH8804> thee in righteousness <WH6664>, and will hold <WH2388> <WH8686> thine hand <WH3027>, and will keep <WH5341> <WH8799> thee, and give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee for a covenant <WH1285> of the people <WH5971>, for a light <WH216> of the goyim <WH1471>;

To open <WH6491> <WH8800> the blind <WH5787> eyes <WH5869>, to bring out <WH3318> <WH8687> the prisoners <WH616> from the prison <WH4525>, and them that sit <WH3427> <WH8802> in darkness <WH2822> out of the prison <WH3608> house <WH1004>.
I am the YY <WH3068>: that is my name <WH8034>: and my glory <WH3519> will I not give <WH5414> <WH8799> to another <WH312>, neither my praise <WH8416> to graven images <WH6456>.

Behold, the former things <WH7223> are come to pass <WH935> <WH8804>, and new things <WH2319> do I declare <WH5046> <WH8688>: before they spring forth <WH6779> <WH8799> I tell <WH8085> <WH8686> you of them.

Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>, and his praise <WH8416> from the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>, ye that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the sea <WH3220>, and all that is therein <WH4393>; the isles <WH339>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> thereof.

Let the wilderness <WH4057> and the cities <WH5892> thereof lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> their voice, the villages <WH2691> that Kedar <WH6938> doth inhabit <WH3427> <WH8799>: let the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the rock <WH5553> sing <WH7442> <WH8799>, let them shout <WH6681> <WH8799> from the top <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022>.
Let them give <WH7760> <WH8799> glory <WH3519> unto the YY <WH3068>, and declare <WH5046> <WH8686> his praise <WH8416> in the islands <WH339>.

The YY <WH3068> shall go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> as a mighty man <WH1368>, he shall stir up <WH5782> <WH8686> jealousy <WH7068> like a man <WH376> of war <WH4421>: he shall cry <WH7321> <WH8686>, yea, roar <WH6873> <WH8686>; he shall prevail <WH1396> <WH8691> against his enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

I have long time <WH5769> holden my peace <WH2814> <WH8689>; I have been still <WH2790> <WH8686>, and refrained <WH662> <WH8691> myself: now will I cry <WH6463> <WH8799> like a travailing woman <WH3205> <WH8802>; I will destroy <WH5395> <WH8799> <WH8676> <WH8074> <WH8799> and devour <WH7602> <WH8799> at once <WH3162>.

I will make waste <WH2717> <WH8686> mountains <WH2022> and hills <WH1389>, and dry up <WH3001> <WH8686> all their herbs <WH6212>; and I will make <WH7760> <WH8804> the rivers <WH5104> islands <WH339>, and I will dry up <WH3001> <WH8686> the pools <WH98>.

And I will bring <WH3212> <WH8689> the blind <WH5787> by a way <WH1870> that they knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not; I will lead <WH1869> <WH8686> them in paths <WH5410> that they have not known <WH3045> <WH8804>: I will make <WH7760> <WH8799> darkness <WH4285> light <WH216> before <WH6440> them, and crooked things <WH4625> straight <WH4334>. These things <WH1697> will I do <WH6213> <WH8804> unto them, and not forsake <WH5800> <WH8804> them.

They shall be turned <WH5472> <WH8738> back <WH268>, they shall be greatly <WH1322> ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>, that trust <WH982> <WH8802> in graven images <WH6459>, that say <WH559> <WH8802> to the molten images <WH4541>, Ye are our 'elohim <WH430>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, ye deaf <WH2795>; and look <WH5027> <WH8685>, ye blind <WH5787>, that ye may see <WH7200> <WH8800>.

Who is blind <WH5787>, but my servant <WH5650>? or deaf <WH2795>, as my messenger <WH4397> that I sent <WH7971> <WH8799>? who is blind <WH5787> as he that is perfect <WH7999> <WH8794>, and blind <WH5787> as the YY'S <WH3068> servant <WH5650> ?
Seeing <WH7200> <WH8800> <WH8675> <WH7200> <WH8804> many things <WH7227>, but thou observest <WH8104> <WH8799> not; opening <WH6491> <WH8800> the ears <WH241>, but he heareth <WH8085> <WH8799> not.
The YY <WH3068> is well pleased <WH2654> <WH8804> for his righteousness <WH6664> ' sake; he will magnify <WH1431> <WH8686> the Torah <WH8451>, and make it honourable <WH142> <WH8686>.

But this is a people <WH5971> robbed <WH962> <WH8803> and spoiled <WH8154> <WH8803>; they are all of them snared <WH6351> <WH8687> in holes <WH2352> <WH8676> <WH970>, and they are hid <WH2244> <WH8717> in prison <WH3608> houses <WH1004>: they are for a prey <WH957>, and none delivereth <WH5337> <WH8688>; for a spoil <WH4933>, and none saith <WH559> <WH8802>, Restore <WH7725> <WH8685>.
Who among you will give ear <WH238> <WH8686> to this? who will hearken <WH7181> <WH8686> and hear <WH8085> <WH8799> for the time to come <WH268> ?

Who gave <WH5414> <WH8804> Ya`akov <WH3290> for a spoil <WH4933> <WH8675> <WH4882>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> to the robbers <WH962> <WH8802>? did not the YY <WH3068>, he against whom <WH2098> we have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>? for they would <WH14> <WH8804> not walk <WH1980> <WH8800> in his ways <WH1870>, neither were they `Ovedient <WH8085> <WH8804> unto his Torah <WH8451>.

Therefore he hath poured <WH8210> <WH8799> upon him the fury <WH2534> of his anger <WH639>, and the strength <WH5807> of battle <WH4421>: and it hath set him on fire <WH3857> <WH8762> round about <WH5439>, yet he knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not; and it burned <WH1197> <WH8799> him, yet he laid <WH7760> <WH8799> it not to heart <WH3820>.
